Class RelativeFile

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.Domain.Common

MdFilesMerger.Domain.dll

Base class for selected and ignored file models.

IRelativeFile

RelativeFile(int, string?, int, DateTime)

Sets Id to id, Name to path, MainDirId to mainDirId and ModifiedDate to modifiedDate.

public RelativeFile(int id, string? path, int mainDirId, DateTime modifiedDate)

Parameters

id int

The item identification number.

path string

Valid relative path to existing .md file associated with this item. Path should use '/' as directory separator.

mainDirId int

Id of MainDirectory object associated with this item.

modifiedDate DateTime

Date and time of last modification of this entity.

Remarks

No evaluation or adjusting is performed, so use this method only for already evaluated and prepared data, for example from database.

Gets absolute path of file associated with the current instance.

public string? GetPath(string? mainDirPath)

Parameters

mainDirPath string

Absolute or relative (to current directory) path of main directory, that the path saved in Name is relative to.

Returns

string

System specific absolute path created by combining mainDirPath and relative path saved in Name.

IRelativeFile

SetPath(string?, string?)

Sets Name to relative path with '/' as directory separator.

public virtual bool SetPath(string? path, string? mainDirPath)

Parameters

path string

Absolute or relative (to current directory) path to existing .md file associated with this instance.

mainDirPath string

Absolute or relative (to current directory) path to base directory, associated with this instance.

Returns

bool

true, if Name was successfully set to path; otherwise false.

Remarks

Set path is relative to mainDirPath. If path doesn't point to existing .md file, Name is set to null.
